title: tiruvEragam urai guruparA
sahitya:
tiruvEragam urai guruparA unnaruLai tara vENum en kurai viraivil maraiyavE


anupallavi

  krpAkaranE unnai sharaNamena aNugi caramAriyAga varum sakalarum uivarE


caraNam    ariya praNava mantra antarangp-poruLai arumait-tandai shiva perumAukk-uraittavanE
perumai idaippOl perum sirappadanaip-peTra pEr illaiyE veTrivEl ayyanE
